ModMetaData.name: Mechanoid Figures (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: tikubonn
ModMetaData.description:
Update of tikubonns mod for RimWorld 1.1 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1498599663
[img]https://i.imgur.com/GYswkZ7.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/MechanoidFigures
--- Original Description --- This mod add some lovely character figures to your RimWorld! You can collect those as hobby. But be careful! You cannot make those by yourself. So if you want to get it, you should find it in your world. I want to make animal figures mod that like as this mod if I have motivation :D
Append items: * Centipede figure * Scyther figure * Lancers figure
